definition: early season rice/rice at transplanting or still unripe

sentences.english: China expects higher rice planting acre.
sentences.chinese: 中国计划增加早稻播种面积。

sentences.english: The effects of four factors on techniques for seedling establishment of No-tillage seedling broadcasting cultivation of early hybrid rice were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了四个不同因素对杂交早稻免耕抛栽立苗的影响。

sentences.english: The harvest season for early rice is about to come.
sentences.chinese: 早稻的丰收季节即将到来。

sentences.english: Both Waseda University and the companies represented are clients of Resona.
sentences.chinese: 早稻田大学和出席的公司都是Resona的客户。

sentences.english: The early rice output in that commune was 200% more than that of 2001.
sentences.chinese: 那个公社的早稻产量是2001年的两倍。

sentences.english: The application of biogas slurry soaking seed on early rice production was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 进行了沼液浸种在早稻生产中的应用试验。

sentences.english: Chilling in May causes damages on early rice in the double cropping system.
sentences.chinese: 五月低温是影响湖南双季早稻的一种常见的低温冷害。

sentences.english: For early rice, young panicle formation stage and elongation stage often overlapped.
sentences.chinese: 就早稻而言，稻穗分化期和拔节期几乎同时进行。

sentences.english: The content relates the popularization of the early rice.
sentences.chinese: 其内容涉及到早稻的推广等方面。

sentences.english: The yield of late rice was lower than that of early rice under rainfed condition.
sentences.chinese: 雨养条件下晚稻产量普遍低于早稻产量。

sentences.english: Biogas slurry soaking seed could control rice bakanae disease, improve its economical character and increase yield.
sentences.chinese: 进行了沼液浸种在早稻生产中的应用试验。

sentences.english: The key issues to further raise the yield of early hybrid rice were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了提高杂交早稻单产需要解决的关键问题。

sentences.english: The flood water covered over 10 hectares of early rice.
sentences.chinese: 洪水覆盖了超过10公顷早稻。

sentences.english: But rice planting could not be completed on time because of the effects of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 但受干旱影响，部分早稻因缺水无法按时栽插。

sentences.english: Application of nitrogenous fertilizer to early rice at the ear primordia stage under the triple-cropping system was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对三熟制早稻用氮素化肥作穗肥进行了研究。

sentences.english: Waseda Jitsugyo Elementary's brochure values one share at 100,000 yen.
sentences.chinese: 在早稻田实业小学的手册中，一股的价值是十万日元。

definition: sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
the embryonic development of grain while still on the stem
to plant early/to sow seeds in early spring/early sowing
